original: Ellison, Carl Elis, disponent, Norrköping, f. 27/10/90 i Ringarum, Ös-tergötl. 1., av byggmäst. Carl August E. o. Elin Maria Engström. G. 14 m. Ruth Bohlin. Barn: Carl Lennart f. 15, Ruth Gunnel 21. — Stud. v. handrsk. samt i Engl. Verkst dir. i A-B Manus i Norrköp. sed. 20. Led. av stadsfullm., drätselkamm., hälso- c. sjukvistyr., uppbördsv. m. m. RVO, PatrstGM.
translated: Ellison, Carl Elis, manager, Norrköping, b. 27/10/90 in Ringarum, Östergötland, son of master builder Carl August E. and Elin Maria Engström. Married on 14/xx/xx to Ruth Bohlin. Children: Carl Lennart b. 1915, Ruth Gunnel b. 1921. Studied commerce and English. Currently managing director at A-B Manus in Norrköping since 1920. Member of city council, finance committee, health and medical committee, and collection committee. Awarded RVO (Knight of the Order of Vasa), PatrstGM (Court Medal of Gustav V).

structured.name: Carl Elis Ellison
